message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your turn Alice, how about a 55-45 split in my favor?
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers, 58-42 is a fair compromise.
The clock is ticking Alice. 52-48 is my final offer.
Don't bluff, 52-48 is not your final offer. I'll take a bit less than before, 57-43.
Okay, Alice, you're right. I'm willing to compromise slightly. 51-49, take it or leave it.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more. 56-44 is my new offer.
